entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is a person who has worked for Gringotts since leaving Hogwarts. He knows goblins well.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one Bill wants to have a private word with, and it's implied that he's planning something with Griphook.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who Harry is planning something with. Bill knows him well.

relationships.description: Bill wants to have a private word with Harry, implying that he's concerned about what Harry is planning with Griphook.
Bill knows Griphook well, having worked for Gringotts and having goblin friends.
